Body: For some reason, I don't get email notifications in folders outside of the default 'Inbox' folder. When I check my settings for the account, 'Email notifications' is checked. When I go to "Folder settings" and scroll down to my Other/XYZ folder, I have 'Sync this folder' checked off.However, I'm still not getting any email notifications when a sub folder receives an email. Any idea why this might be the case? and if there's a way for me to fix this?
Title: Why don't I get notifications for sub-folders using Gmail app? Notifications is checked

history.Text: For some reason, I don't get email notifications in folders outside of the default 'Inbox' folder. When I check my settings for the account, 'Email notifications' is checked. When I go to "Folder settings" and scroll down to my Other/XYZ folder, I have 'Sync this folder' checked off.However, I'm still not getting any email notifications when a sub folder receives an email. Any idea why this might be the case? and if there's a way for me to fix this?
Why don't I get notifications for sub-folders using Gmail app? Notifications is checked
